section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: This statement grants the Managers the sole authority to determine the Purpose of the Venture. This lacks specifics and conflicts with the Members' intent to jointly invest and set up a joint venture enterprise (Background A). It could also be interpreted that the managers can use their 'full authority to bind the members in all matters.'

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There is a misalignment in terminology as BorrowMoney.com's capital contribution is listed as 'To be determined USD', which is incomplete and contradictory. The agreement says that each of the members has contributed to the capital, but it does not say the amount that BorrowMoney is contributing. The capital contribution from JVLS is also confusing as it states a monetary amount of $60,000.00 as well as $3,500,000.00 USD

section: Unless a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: This section allows the remaining members to determine a value deemed appropriate. This creates conflicting obligations because a fair market value will need to be determined. The value of a withdrawing Member's interest is determined at the 'discretion' of the remaining members, which leads to ambiguity on how to value the interests and is contradictory to normal practices.
